alert.note: Alert for Fairfield; New Haven (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 14 at 9:50AM EDT until July 15 at 2:12AM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO JUST AFTER MIDNIGHT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Housatonic River At Stevenson Dam. * WHEN...From this afternoon to just after midnight tonight. * IMPACTS...At 11.0 feet, Flood stage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:30 AM EDT Friday the stage was 10.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this afternoon to a crest of 11.1 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage this evening. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 11.2 feet on 03/29/1994. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Housatonic River Stevenson Dam Flood Stage: 11.0 Observed Stage at Fri 9 am: 10.3 Forecast: Fri 8 am 8.7 Fri 2 pm 11.1 Fri 8 pm 11.1 Sat 2 am 7.9 Sat 8 am 7.9 Sat 2 pm 7.9 Sat 8 pm 7.9 Sun 2 am 7.9 Sun 8 am 9.1 Sun 2 pm 9.4 Sun 8 pm 9.9 Mon 2 am 10.4 &&
